exclusion.criterion: Medical, surgical, laboratory or other conditions which in the judgment of the Physician Investigator would make the subject unsuitable for enrollment, or potentially interfere with subject participation or completion of the study.
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: Patient is a 24-year-old man with type 1 diabetes who presents to the emergency room with hyperglycemia and concern for possible diabetic ketoacidosis. He has been on insulin since diagnosis and has never been prescribed oral agents.
